name: The Light At The Frankenstein Place
name_original: The Light At The Frankenstein Place
description:
What is going on at the Frankenstein place? Everything! Should you investigate? (It'll be a short adventure if you don't – but an adventure nonetheless!)

Best experienced in full screen if you wish to avoid the scrollbars and enjoy the art. Alternatively, best viewed in the frame if you wish to admire the typography (such that it is). I can't win, really.

This is my first Twine game! It's intentionally small as part of a series I'm working on to practice my narrative skills (and a little bit of pixel art).

I hope you enjoy it.

Credits:

  • Mandy J Watson (@mandyjwatson): Game design, narrative and writing, programming, and art
  • Fonts: Berkshire Swash by Brian J Bonislawsky DBA Astigmatic (AOETI) (Open Font Licence) and Alike Angular by Sveta Sebyakina, Alexei Vanyashin, and Cyreal (Open Font Licence)
